trim.if: AND ( mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') OR customer.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') OR customer.CUSTOMER_PHONE = #{q} )

mapper.select:
SELECT mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_ID "id", mallShopAdvert.CUSTOMER_ID "customerId", mallShopAdvert.COUNTRY_ID "countryId", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_NAME "advertName", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_CONTEXT "advertContext", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_IMAGE "advertImage", mallShopAdvert.SHOP_LICENCE "shopLicence", mallShopAdvert.SHOP_VIDEO "shopVideo", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_CLASSIFY_ID "advertClassifyId", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_PHONE "advertPhone", mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_PROVINCE "addressProvince", mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_CITY "addressCity", mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_AREA "addressArea", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_ADDRESS "advertAddress", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_LONGITUDE "advertLongitude", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_LATITUDE "advertLatitude", mallShopAdvert.APPLY_STATUS "applyStatus", mallShopAdvert.APPLY_CONTEXT "applyContext", mallShopAdvert.VERSION_NUM "versionNum", mallShopAdvert.FLAG_DEL "flagDel", mallShopAdvert.CREATE_TIME "createTime", mallShopAdvert.CREATE_USER "createUser", mallShopAdvert.MODIFY_USER "modifyUser", mallShopAdvert.MODIFY_TIME "modifyTime", appArea1.AREA_NAME "addressProvinceName", appArea2.AREA_NAME "addressCityName", appArea3.AREA_NAME "addressAreaName", customer.CUSTOMER_NAME "customerName", customer.CUSTOMER_PHONE "customerPhone", mallShopClassify.CLASSIFY_NAME "advertClassifyName" FROM mall_shop_advert mallShopAdvert LEFT OUTER JOIN mall_shop_classify mallShopClassify ON mallShopClassify.CLASSIFY_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_CLASSIFY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea1 ON appArea1.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_PROVINCE LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea2 ON appArea2.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_CITY LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea3 ON appArea3.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_AREA LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_info customer ON customer.CUSTOMER_ID = mallShopAdvert.CUSTOMER_ID
ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mall_shop_advert mallShopAdvert LEFT OUTER JOIN mall_shop_classify mallShopClassify ON mallShopClassify.CLASSIFY_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_CLASSIFY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea1 ON appArea1.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_PROVINCE LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea2 ON appArea2.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_CITY LEFT OUTER JOIN app_area appArea3 ON appArea3.AREA_ID = mallShopAdvert.ADDRESS_AREA LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_info customer ON customer.CUSTOMER_ID = mallShopAdvert.CUSTOMER_ID

SELECT mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_ID "id", mallShopAdvert.CUSTOMER_ID "customerId", mallShopAdvert.COUNTRY_ID "countryId", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_NAME "advertName", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_CONTEXT "advertContext", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_IMAGE "advertImage", mallShopAdvert.SHOP_LICENCE "shopLicence", mallShopAdvert.SHOP_VIDEO "shopVideo", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_PHONE "advertPhone", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_ADDRESS "advertAddress", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_LONGITUDE "advertLongitude", mallShopAdvert.ADVERT_LATITUDE "advertLatitude", mallShopAdvert.APPLY_STATUS "applyStatus", mallShopAdvert.APPLY_CONTEXT "applyContext" FROM mall_shop_advert mallShopAdvert
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
